column2: "Asa n’ahendzi afe a otsia eduasa esia no mu
column3: na Israelhen Baasha fowee kɔr Juda do
column5: dɛ ɔremma kwan ma obiara nndzi Judahen Asa nkyɛn akɔnaaba."

column2: "Nna Asa faa dwetɛ na sika fi EWURADZE ne fie na ɔhen no ne fie akoradze mu
column3: na ɔsomae ma wɔdze kɔr Siriahen Ben-hadad a ɔtse Damaskɔs no nkyɛn dɛ
column5: "Nkyekyeree bi da emi na ɔwo ntamu
column6: dɛ mbrɛ nkyɛ ɔda m’egya na w’egya ntamu no: hwɛ
column7: mama wɔdze dwetɛ na sika rebrɛ wo; kɔ
column8: kɛtsetsew ɔwo nye Israelhen Baasha nkyekyeree no mu

column3: na ɔsomaa no dɔm do asafohemfo wɔ Israel nkurow do; na wɔkɔbɔɔ Ijon
column6: na Naftali adzekora nkurow no nyinara."

column2: "Nna ɔhen Asa faa Juda nyinara; na wɔkɔsoaa Rama abo
column3: na ndua no a Baasha dze kyekyeree no; na ɔdze kyekyeer Geba na Mizpa."

column2: "Na aber no mu no adzehunyi Hanani baa Judahen Asa nkyɛn
column5: na anntwer EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn no ntsi na Siriahen no dɔm no efi wo nsa eguan no."

column2: "Ana Etiopiafo na Lubifo no nnyɛ dɔmtutuw
column3: wɔ ntseaseanam na mpɔnkɔdofo dodow mbordo mu bi a? Naaso

column2: "Na EWURADZE dze n’enyi kɔ asaase nyina do aprɔw
column3: dɛ ɔdze n’ahoɔdzen bedzi ama hɔn a hɔn akoma dzi mu wɔ no ho no. Iyi mu na ayɛ nkwaseadze; dɛm ntsi ofi ha kɔ yi ibenya akodzi."

column2: "Nna Asa no bo fuuw adzehunyi no
column3: na ɔdze no kɔtoo adaduadan no mu; na onyaa no ho ebufuw wɔ asɛm yi ntsi. Na Asa tseetsee ɔman no mu binom wɔ mber no ara so mu."

column5: kan dze na ekyir dze no
column6: wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Juda na Israel ahemfo nwoma no mu."

column2: "Na Asa n’ahendzi no mu afe a otsia eduasa akron no mu na ɔyaar n’anan; ne yarba no yɛɛ kɛse mbordo: naaso ne yarba no mu no ɔannhwehwɛ EWURADZE
"Na Asa kɔr ne nsamankyir wɔ n’ahendzi no mu afe a otsia eduanan biako no mu."
"Na wosiee no wɔ nankasa n’asamandan a otwae maa noho wɔ David kurow mu no mu
column3: na wɔdze no too mpa a nduhuam na ndur ahorow a wɔaforafora no nduforaforafo nyansaa mu ahyɛ do ma no do: na wɔbɔɔ ogya kɛsenara hyɛɛ no enyimnyam."
